attributes.action: Help to release money paid into private pension funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have frozen my private pension,because to change into a company stakehloder pension i was going to be charged 20% of my total savings fund, this is with Phoenix.
I also cannot start to draw any money from my pension till iam 50, can the Government do anything to stop this so i can invest my money else were.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
